criteria.name: Work Breakdown Completeness
criteria.description: All work described by user is broken down into logical phases, work packages, and actionable tasks

criteria.name: Dependency & Sequencing
criteria.description: Task dependencies are clearly identified, sequencing is logical, and critical path is evident

criteria.name: Realistic Estimates
criteria.description: Time and resource estimates are reasonable, achievable, and properly justified

criteria.name: Clear Milestones
criteria.description: Milestones mark significant achievements with measurable completion criteria

criteria.name: Strategic Alignment
criteria.description: Work plan aligns with project charter objectives and overall project scope

criteria.name: OpenProject Readiness
criteria.description: Format is structured for easy import to OpenProject (phases, tasks, milestones properly formatted)

passing_message: Work plan meets quality standards and is ready for execution
failing_message: Work plan needs refinement in structure, estimates, or completeness before proceeding
